title: (1) Sony SCD-CE595 5 Disc Changer Multi Channel Audio CD Player
item_description:
(1) Sony SCD-CE595 5 Disc Changer Multi Channel Audio CD Player

(1) Sony SCD-CE595 5 Disc Changer Multi Channel Audio CD Player

Description:

Sony's SCD-CE595 gives you great sound from the CDs and Super Audio CDs in your music collection, along with the convenience of a five-disc changer. Multichannel Super Audio CD playback places you in the middle of a spacious, six-channel soundscape, rendered with stunning clarity and frequency response all the way out to 40,000 Hz. And multichannel bass management lets you tailor the SACD output to best match your speakers.

Product highlights:
  • 5-disc changer plays multichannel and stereo SACDs, CDs, audio CD-Rs and CD-RWs
  • Super Audio D/A converter
  • SACD/CD Text display
  • time alignment function for optimal SACD playback
  • stereo and multichannel analog output
  • optical digital output (for CD , CD-R, and CD-RW playback only)
  • remote control ready
  • frequency response 2-40,000 Hz (SACD playback)
  • 99 dB dynamic range (CD playback)
  • 16-15/16"W x 4-3/8"H x 17-3/4"D
